Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm sure this is easily fixed, but I've got a slight issue with staging since the recent update.

Basically, say if in one particular stage of the flight I want two external tanks to decouple at the same time from the spacecraft, before the update (whilst in flight) I would simply press the SPACE bar once and that stage would be complete. However, after the update, even if more than one thing is in the stage like a decouple, it takes 2 SPACE bar strikes to initiate the action, despite them both being in exactly the same stage.

It's probably a stupid question but answers are much needed thankyou
I've not encountered this, are you running any mods?

Ahhh that worked! That's very strange though, considering that the only mod I was running was a lazor mod which assisted in docking... weird.

Thanks for your help!
